4 double quickcoupler_x = 0.035; //distance between quickcoupler frame origin and edge in x-direction

38  tf::Quaternion q = tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(0.0,-M_PI/2,0.0);
39  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped marker_pose;
40  marker_pose.header.frame_id = "bucket_raedlinger";
41  marker_pose.pose.position.x = - quickcoupler_z; //translate the quickcoupler so that both locks match
42  marker_pose.pose.position.y = 0.0;
43  marker_pose.pose.position.z = 0.25; //adjust
44  marker_pose.pose.orientation.x = q[0];
45  marker_pose.pose.orientation.y = q[1];
46  marker_pose.pose.orientation.z = q[2];
47  marker_pose.pose.orientation.w = q[3];

49 
50  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped marker_pose_in_world_frame;
51  //transform object pose from gripper frame to chassis frame
52  listener.waitForTransform("chassis","bucket_raedlinger", ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(0.1)); //avoid time difference exception
53  listener.transformPose("chassis",ros::Time(0), marker_pose, "bucket_raedlinger", marker_pose_in_world_frame);
54 
55  ros::Publisher markerP;
56  markerP = nh.advertise<visualization_msgs::Marker>("visualization_marker", 10);
57  uint32_t shape = visualization_msgs::Marker::ARROW;
58  visualization_msgs::Marker marker;
59  marker.header.frame_id = "bucket_raedlinger";
60  marker.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();

74 
75  while (markerP.getNumSubscribers() < 1)

77  ROS_WARN_ONCE("Please create a subscriber to the marker");
78  sleep(1);
79  }
80  markerP.publish(marker);

82  akitGroup.setPoseTarget(marker_pose_in_world_frame.pose);
83  bool success = (akitGroup.plan(motionPlan) == moveit::planning_interface::MoveItErrorCode::SUCCESS);
84  if(success)
85  akitGroup.execute(motionPlan);
86 
87  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped marker_pose_in_quickcoupler_frame;
88  //transform pose from chassis/world frame to quickcoupler frame
89  listener.waitForTransform("quickcoupler","chassis", ros::Time::now(), ros::Duration(0.1)); //avoid time difference exception

91 
92  marker_pose_in_quickcoupler_frame.pose.position.x -= 0.25 + quickcoupler_x;

94  //transform pose from quickcoupler frame to chassis/world frame

97 
98  akitGroup.setPoseTarget(marker_pose_in_world_frame.pose);

103  moveit::core::RobotStatePtr current_state = akitGroup.getCurrentState();
104  std::vector<double> joint_group_positions;
105  current_state->copyJointGroupPositions(joint_model_group, joint_group_positions);
106 
107  const std::vector<std::string> &jointNames = joint_model_group->getVariableNames();
108 
109  joint_group_positions[4] += M_PI/2; //rotate quickcoupler
110  akitGroup.setJointValueTarget(joint_group_positions);
111  success = (akitGroup.plan(motionPlan) == moveit::planning_interface::MoveItErrorCode::SUCCESS);
112  if(success)
113  akitGroup.execute(motionPlan);

115  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < jointNames.size(); ++i){
